name: Flashback: Tricky Fun Riddles
description:
Welcome to the unique world of Flashback!

This game has been developed for you to challenge yourself, train your brain, and improve your thinking skills!

Are you looking for a new and different game among hundreds of riddles games? You are in the right place and the game you are looking for is right here! Flashback is designed with brand new features for players who love brain puzzle games but seek innovation in the game!

Flashback offers a new time control gameplay while solving complicated riddles, unique puzzles and iq tests! Watch the scene, go back in time, find clues and complete the levels!

Flashback has multiple types of scenarios and puzzles to solve. This new riddle game gives you a chance to learn the truth behind the scenes, uncover mysterious scenarios and train your brain! You can solve all the riddles and prove that you're the smartest people between all of your friends!

Flashback is a combination of a variety of riddles, mind challenges, brain teasers, tricky puzzles, logical IQ tests, mind-blowing clues that will make you think critically.

Tricky brain teasers and IQ tests guarantee that you will have a lot of fun playing this game and you will be addicted to Flashback!

Feature of the game:

- Addictive gameplay
- Challenging clues to find
- Lots of different characters
- Control the time! Slide and find!
- Hundreds of puzzles and iq tests
- Unique quality animations and drawings
- Brain training that develops thinking skills!

Start a relentless challenge for yourself and your friends. Show your strength, prove your intelligence! Become the best riddle solver player!

Download the game now, share it with your friends!

Enjoy Flashback!
